data.persona: I am royal family member who is loyal . I am a royal  family member who loves my subjects. I am a royal family member who will be the next king.
data.description:
You are in the Stable.
A plain wooden building with some hanging tapestries.  There are some handsome looking horses that reside here along with some farm equipment stored inside.
There's a hanging tapestry here.
The horse is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow this horse to the track.
data.mid_motivation: I'm shopping around for horses today to use one as a personal steed.
data.long_motivation: A race will be held amongst the nobility soon and I want to have a winner of a horse when it comes around.
